title: J-K cop lynching: Should police complement the Army or serve the people?
description: As violence spirals once again in the region and Kashmir’s police find themselves in the crosshairs of militants and blood-thirsty mobs. The government must decide what it wants their role to be

title: Pentagon report is proof that India's Afghan policy is on the right track
description: The importance of Pentagon’s report lies in its timing. It is the first one released under President Donald Trump and is taking place as the geopolitical playbook in Afghanistan is once again being rewritten

title: AIIMS MBBS result 2017: Top 10 from one Kota coaching school. Isn't it odd?
description: This All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) MBBS 2017 examination results must be treated as a wake-up call by the policy makers and all those who are involved in the setting the papers

title: LS Speaker Sumitra Mahajan must realise that journalists are not PR professiona...
description: If the Lok Sabha Speaker thinks that ‘good-news’ journalism helps the government in power, she is wrong. No government can benefit from dressing uncomfortable facts in pleasant language or indeed not bringing them to public attention at all

title: Charging people with sedition for raising 'pro-Pakistan' slogans is ridiculous
description: The strength of India lies not in suppressing voices but in its long-standing tradition of multiculturalism and plurality that has held the country together even at the worst of times.

title: Green tribunal should step in to prevent the assault on Aravalis
description: With dwindling water resources, the Natural Conservation Zone concept is highly relevant today since concrete structures on wetlands, gullies, ravines, foothills and storm water drains disrupt the replenishment of ground water

title: The office of the President must be above caste, religion and gender
description: The candidate should not be part of a larger political agenda on the part of either the government or the Opposition. No one doubts the credentials of Ram Nath Kovind or the fact that him being chosen is a victory for equal opportunity

title: A US-Russia stand-off in Syria will have dangerous global implications
description: The escalation of military activity in Syria, especially by the US and Russia, is unprecedented and could have dangerous global implications

title: Chief ministers such as Raje are doing more harm than good to Swachh Bharat Abh...
description: The programme will  not be sustainable in the long run if government officials use coercion and violence to end open defecation, and political leaders keep supporting such illegal moves

title: Setting up gaushalas on surplus jail land will not help prisoners
description: BJP-led State governments cannot be totally focused on cow protection and promotion at the cost of other pressing issues

title: Pakistan's India-centric foreign policy based on geopolitical lies is backfiring
description: The repeated snubs Pakistan PM Nawaz Sharif has suffered internationally is a result the contradictions in Islamabad’s foreign policy

title: Darjeeling stir: Mamata is playing with fire by ignoring the Gorkha identity is...
description: West Bengal chief minister Mamata Banerjee is within her rights to plan expansion of Trinamool Congress in the hills, but it will be quite impossible to be accepted as a party representing local aspirations.

title: RBI directive on bankruptcies could start economic revival
description: Bankruptcy helps provide creditors the basis for not only seizing assets of defaulters but for shareholders to initiate criminal proceedings against the promoters

title: Why a few changes in cattle trade rules won't be enough to ensure peace
description: At a time, when jobs are scarce, the social and economic impact of such regulations will be a huge liability for the government.

title: Why do so few girls opt for science and engineering in India?
description: If India wants more women doing science, the barriers ---- travel and safety limitations, centrality of career progression around male working patterns, inflexible work hours and negative stereotyping ---- have to fall. There are no short cuts in this roadmap.
